com.google.flightmap.android.graphics
Class ZoomScale

java.lang.Object
  com.google.flightmap.android.graphics.ZoomScale

public class ZoomScale
extends Object

Draws the graphical zoom scale. The size of the scale bar changes slightly to make it match the scale shown. The distances shown will be integers.

private  float actualWidth
           
private static int BOTTOM_OFFSET
          Number of pixels up from the bottom of the screen to draw the scale.

drawScale

public void drawScale(android.graphics.Canvas c,
                      android.location.Location l,
                      double zoom)
Draws zoom scale.

Parameters:
c - canvas to draw on.
l - current location.
zoom - zoom level.

getScaleText

private String getScaleText(android.location.Location location,
                            double zoom)
Returns the text to display above the zoom scale bar. Also updates actualWidth.

Parameters:
location - current location.
zoom - zoom level.

scaleTextIsCached

private boolean scaleTextIsCached(android.location.Location location,
                                  double zoom)
Checks if cached scale text is still valid. Cached result is valid if the location has changed less than ZOOM_UPDATE_DISTANCE and units are unchanged.
